cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with online learning and classification, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of machine learning. Specifically, it focuses on multiclass classification, which is a subfield of machine learning that deals with the classification of instances into multiple classes. The paper also discusses the bandit scenario, which is a common framework in online learning where the true label of an instance is not revealed to the learner. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), which are also relevant to the topic. Additionally, the paper involves information theory and communication complexity, which are covered by cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.CC (Computational Complexity), respectively.
